{{cpp/ranges/title|output_range}}
{{cpp/ranges/navbar}}

{{ddcl|header = ranges|since=c++20|1=
template&lt;class R, class T&gt;
concept output_range =
    ranges::range&lt;R&gt; &amp;&amp; std::output_iterator&lt;ranges::iterator_t&lt;R&gt;, T&gt;;
}}

The {{tt|output_range}} concept is a refinement of {{lconcept|range}} for which {{lc|ranges::begin}} returns a model of {{lconcept|output_iterator}}.
